name: Tin Edge
description:
Hey everyone! I'm Hudson, and I like to make games. This is a fast action FPS that you don't wanna miss! Here is a list of some things to get you prepared to play:
1. You can only see one of your guns, but there is always another gun there, sometimes there's two!
2. There are 18 levels, 3 levels per weapon category, 6 categories.
3. There is an Open World where you can run around and pickup weapons and heals!
If you want to learn more there is a video on my channel about the making of this game, or you can read the Documentation in the game itself. If you have any suggestions, feel free to comment below. I will try to answer all of them! Enjoy the Early Access!
